import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import { Navbar, Nav, Container, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { logout } from '../actions/userActions' import SearchBox from '../components/SearchBox' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { listProducts, getCategories } from '../actions/productActions' function Header() { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin const dispatch = useDispatch() const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout()) } const productList = useSelector(state => state.productList) const {loading} = productList const productCategories = useSelector(state => state.productCategories) const categories = productCategories.categories.categories const {loading: loadingCategories} = productCategories useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProducts()) dispatch(getCategories()) }, [dispatch]) return (
{loading ? : (

NutriNation
About Us Cart {loadingCategories ? : ( Categories} id='categories' style={{ fontSize: '1.1rem' }}> {categories.map((category) => ( e.target.style.color = 'darkred'} onMouseLeave={(e) => e.target.style.color = 'black'}>{category} ))} )} {userInfo ? ( Hi, {userInfo.name}!} id='username' style={{ fontSize: '1.1rem' }}> Profile Log Out ) : ( <> Log In Register ) } {userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin && ( Admin} id='adminmenu' style={{ fontSize: '1.1rem' }}> Users Products Orders Promo Codes )}
)}
) } export default Header
